original_text:
And now I will break his yoke from off you
    and will burst your bonds apart.”
korean_text: 이제 네게 지운 그의 멍에를 내가 깨뜨리고 네 결박을 끊으리라

sentences.original_text: And now I will break his yoke from off you
sentences.korean_translation: 이제는 내가 너희에게서 그 멍에를 끊으리라

sentences.original_text: and will burst your bonds apart.
